L2_gloss: useful, helpful, વાંચણ ઉપયોગી આયvā̃caṇ upayogī āyareading

interrogative pronoun; what, which
કુરો થિયોkuro thiyoWhat happened?

marks the genitive case:  of, belonging to
કચ્છજો વહીવટી મથક ભુજ આયkacchajo vahīvṭī mathak bhuj āyaKutch's administrative center is Bhuj

own (reflexive pronoun)
પિંઢજો પલંગpiṇḍhajo palaṅgone's own bed
language, speech, dialect, form or style of speech

to read
મું કે વાંચણુ આયmũ ke vā̃cṇu āyaI have to read
